meanings.definition: A large, carnivorous feline with a yellowish-brown coat and black spots.
meanings.sent1: The leopard prowled through the jungle, its spotted coat blending with the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw a leopard at the zoo today, it was so beautiful with its golden fur and dark spots.
meanings.sent3: The leopard tried to hide behind a tiny bush, thinking it was camouflaged.
meanings.sent4: Her sleek movements on the dance floor were like a leopard hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The children gasped in awe as the leopard gracefully leaped from branch to branch.

meanings.definition: A yellowish-brown color with black spots, resembling the coat of a leopard.
meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a lovely leopard color scheme, with golden walls and dark spots.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed paints to create the perfect leopard shade for his masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The leopard-patterned scarf added a wild touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent4: The leopard print on her shoes made her feel fierce and stylish.
meanings.sent5: The cake was decorated with leopard spots made of chocolate, looking almost real.
